mapper.insert: insert into project_review (id, project_id, score, is_support, operate_user) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{projectId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isSupport,jdbcType=BIT}, #{operateUser,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.select: select id, project_id, score, is_support, operate_user from project_review
